var aes256=require("aes256");//the secret key used for encrypting and decrypting messages
var secret_key="uI2ooxtwHeI6q69PS98fx9SWVGbpQohO";//returns the encrypted text
export var to_Encrypt=function to_Encrypt(text){var encrypted=aes256.encrypt(secret_key,text);return encrypted;};//welcome message is not decrypted
export var to_Decrypt=function to_Decrypt(cipher,username){if(cipher.startsWith("Welcome")){return cipher;}if(cipher.startsWith(username)){return cipher;}//decryped message is returned
var decrypted=aes256.decrypt(secret_key,cipher);return decrypted;};
